pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, May 2, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nunavut, P.J. Akeeagok.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

The Prime Minister will speak with His Majesty King Charles III.
